articles.title: Bove returns to the pitch with Watford more than a year after his illness
articles.summary: Fourteen months after his illness on the pitch, Edoardo Bove returns to play. The player who left his contract with Roma in January then became a new player for Watford, the English Championship team.

articles.title: GdS: Milan Futuro’s forced reset has been strengthened by recent graduates
articles.summary: AC Milan had big expectations for the Futuro project, and it certainly did not start well with relegation. However, it is still proving to be a success. articles.title: MN: Loftus-Cheek’s priority is and always has been Milan renewal after January rumours
articles.summary: It seemed Ruben Loftus-Cheek was heading to the door in January. However, the Englishman instead preferred to stay at AC Milan.  Throughout January, there was enough to suggest that Loftus-Cheek was going to leave Milan. He reportedly wanted more playing time, which the Rossoneri could not give him,

articles.title: Midfield freedom to combat central block: Tactical analysis of Pisa 1-2 AC Milan
articles.summary: AC Milan travelled to Pisa on Friday night in the first game of the latest Serie A round, and they were given a scare by relegation battlers Pisa. articles.title: GdS: Allegri, Maignan and more – Milan seeking revenge in many ways
articles.summary: After last season, there are several players seeking revenge at AC Milan. However, there are also some who don’t have the burden of last year weighing on them. Before the Pisa game, Massimiliano Allegri stated that Milan was a team seeking revenge when he was asked about the qualities of his squad.

articles.title: MN: Saelemaekers trains alone again as Como game draws nearer – the situation
articles.summary: Alexis Saelemaekers was hoped to be back in training by now. However, the AC Milan wingback is still not back with the group. articles.title: GdS: Allegri message to the group after Pisa – Loftus-Cheek’s issue and first half problems
articles.summary: AC Milan got three points against Pisa on Friday night, but it certainly wasn’t easy and Massimiliano Allegri had a few things to say to his squad after.  Above all, it is a win for Milan against a newly promoted side. It feels strange to be celebrating that in February. However, it has troubled the

articles.title: Chivu references Milan’s advantage in Scudetto race after Juventus win: “We were naive”
articles.summary: It is no secret that Inter are leading the Scudetto race by an almost uncatchable margin currently, but AC Milan are not out of it.  There has been a lot said about the Scudetto this season, but in Milan’s context, it has normally been a case of hoping, rather than expecting. After all, Massimiliano

articles.title: Leao offers support to Füllkrug off the pitch after Pisa act – his new role for Milan
articles.summary: Rafael Leao’s maturity and personality are shining currently for AC Milan, and after the Pisa game, the Portuguese can only be applauded. articles.summary: Adriano Galliani has been linked with a return to AC Milan for a while now, and he met with Massimiliano Allegri to have dinner last night. articles.title: ‘Like Tonali’s goal in Rome’ – Longoni compares Modric’s winner to Scudetto year

articles.title: MN: Milan 15 points better than last season as Allegri’s changes show
